text: Niscayanga danalu (sadakhalu) kevalam yacincu nirupedalaku mariyu yacincani pedavariki, (jakat) vyavaharalapai niyuktulaina variki mariyu evari hrdayalanaite (islam vaipuku) akarsinca valasi undo variki, banisala vimukti koraku, rnagrastulaina vari koraku, allah marganlo (poyevari) koraku mariyu batasarula koraku. Idi allah nirnayincina oka vidhi. Mariyu allah sarvajnudu, maha vivekavantudu
